nodes.text: Lying in ruins, the once-prominent Rebel Space Station was the base of operations for most Alliance activity in the Tatoo system.

At the height of the glory of the Alliance, the Empire suffocated any hope of survival. Only a carcass of the Rebel Space Station remained and, floating around it, memories of war in the form of TIE and X-Wing debris. Following this conflict, the the area was simply referred to as Rebel Ruins.
